name: Parkour (itch) (jmdeejay)
description:
Parkour is a runner game with tons of challenges. Your objective is simple - try to run as far as possible.
The levels are randomly generated. The difficulty increases as you run farther.
Lava, monsters, powerup & your quick "decision making" will change your fate.

Features :

  • Randomly generated chunks
  • Powerups (speed, points, invincibility, health)
  • Various obstacles (lava, spikes, monsters)
  • Different levels can be explored as you run farther
  • Achievements & leaderboard (Google Play, Steam)
